description: Number of digits in decimal expansion of 1/n before the periodic part begins.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to decimal expansion of 1/n
formula: for n>1, a(n)=max(i, j) where n=2^i*3^x*5^j*... is the prime decomposition of n.
mathematica: (* f parses output from RealDigits *) f[{{r__Integer, {__}}, k_ /; k <= 0}] := Length[{r}]-k; f[{{r__Integer}, k_ /; k <= 0}] := Length[{r}]-k; f[{{{r__Integer}}, k_ /; k <= 0}] := -k; f[{{{r__Integer, z : (0) ..}}, k_ /; k <= 0}] := -k-Length[{z}]; a[n_] := f[RealDigits[1/n]]; a[1]=0; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 105}]; (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jun 29 2012 *)
